recipes.description: Paneer tikka masala is an Indian dish of marinated paneer cheese served in a spiced gravy. It is a vegetarian alternative to chicken tikka masala.
recipes.name: paneer tikka masala

recipes.description: Butter chicken or murgh makhani is a curry of chicken in a spiced tomato, butter and cream sauce. It originated in the Indian subcontinent as a curry. It is similar to chicken tikka masala, which uses a tomato paste.
recipes.name: Butter Chicken

recipes.description: This simple, seasonal recipe teams up seared chicken and brown rice, loaded with late-summer vegetables. We’re tossing the grains with toasty brown butter—simply butter heated in a pan for a couple of minutes—and a quick sauté of sweet corn. Juicy tomatoes (yours may be red or yellow) and basil seeds marinated in vinegar top off the rice with pops of delicious brightness. (Chefs, your basil seeds will turn white when marinated!)
recipes.name: Chicken & Brown Butter Rice with Corn & Tomatoes
